data.name: Anne Happy!: An Unfortunate First Day of School
data.short_description: On the day of the Tennomifune Academy entrance ceremony, in the class 1-7 classroom, Hanakoizumi Anne (Hanako), Hibarigaoka Ruri (Hibar), and Kumegawa Botan (Botan) are told by their homeroom teacher Kodaira-sensei that they are unfortunate and unhappy students. The goal of the students of class 1-7
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
